content: down to the row 11 on the pouch front and repeat petal row 1 fasten off weave in ends 19 petals bag note bag is worked with 2 strands of thread held together from this point on using the larger crochet hook don t worry if the pouch front and pouch back are not the exact same diameter this is not critical as long as they both have 98 stitches in the final round row 1 joining row hold the right sides facing each other join the pouch front and pouch back together working through both thicknesses and being careful not to catch the petals in your work attach the doubled thread to any ending with chain 3 double_crochet in the first single_crochet to form the last loop 49 loops row 3 ch1 single_crochet in the loop just formed move the stitch marker to this single_crochet *chain 6 single_crochet in the next loop repeat from * ending with chain 3 treble_crochet in the first single_crochet to form the last loop 49 loops row 4-30 repeat row 3 row 31 *2 single_crochet into the next loop repeat from * to the first loop single_crochet join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch 98 stitches row 32 ch1 single_crochet in the same stitch single_crochet in each stitch around 98 stitches handles from the stitch marker count around row 32 49 stitches place the second stitch marker return to the working loop at the first stitch marker chain 50 skip 24 stitches in row 32 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches chain 50 single_crochet in the stitch after the first handle chain single_crochet in the next stitch chain 13 holding the 2 long chains together work 25 single_crochet over both chains chain 13 single_crochet in the next free stitch on row 32 finish off weave in ends re-attach thread at second stitch marker and work a second handle in the same manner finishing instructions tuck the shopping bag into the pouch attach key ring into one of the stitches that joins the pouch front to the pouch back designer bio i ve been crocheting left-handed for over
